Cultural Events


Aaja Nachle
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

From classical elegance to hip-hop grooves, from contemporary storytelling to traditional folk dances, "Aaja Nachle" is a vibrant kaleidoscope of dance forms. Here, the spotlight is on you, the performer, who brings life to the rhythm and turns mere steps into breathtaking performances. "Aaja Nachle" is more than just a competition; it's a celebration of culture, self-expression, and the universal language of dance. As you watch the performers take the stage and pour their hearts into their routines, remember that each dance is a unique story waiting to be told.

1. Aaja Nachle is categorized into two categories:
• Virsa – Punjabi and Folk Dance Competition
• Tune to Dance – Bollywood Western Dance Competition

2. Participant can participate individually or in a group of 6-10.
3. There will be 2 rounds of Aaja Nachle.

First round will be held on 19th October, 2023.
Finale Round will be held on 20th October, 2023.

1. Every participant or team must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the team on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. Time limit for Solo performances is 2-4 minutes.
4. Time limit for Group performances is 3-5 minutes.
5. No vulgarity in songs or performances should be there otherwise the teams will be disqualified.
6. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.

Yakshita –
Pragati - 7986198753
Dhruv – 8427976946
Nazam –
WhatsApp Group



SAREGAMA
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

In a world where the enchanting notes of music can transcend boundaries, cultures, and emotions, "Saregama" is your stage to express your innermost feelings, tell stories, and celebrate the magic of song. Today, we gather to celebrate the passion, talent, and sheer artistry of singers from all walks of life. From classical ragas to contemporary melodies, from soul-stirring ballads to energetic pop anthems, "Saregama" is a magnificent tapestry of musical genres. Here, the spotlight is on you, the performer, who breathes life into lyrics and turns simple verses into unforgettable performances.
Your mission is clear: captivate the audience, touch hearts, and leave a lasting impression with your voice. This competition is not just about winning; it's about the passion, the artistry, and the shared love of music that binds us all.

1. SAREGAMA is categorized into two categories:
• Virsa – Punjabi and Folk Singing Competition
• Tune to Dance – Bollywood and Western Singing Competition

2. Participant can participate individually or in a group of 6-10.
3. There will be 2 rounds of SAREGAMA.

First round will be held on 19th October, 2023.
Finale Round will be held on 20th October, 2023.

1. Every participant or team must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the team on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. Time limit for Solo performances is 2-4 minutes.
4. Time limit for Group performances is 3-5 minutes.
5. There is no language barrier.
6. No vulgarity in songs or performances should be there otherwise the teams will be disqualified.
7. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.

Rangmanch
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

Nukkad Natak, the soul of raw, unadulterated theater, thrives on the essence of reality. This competition is not just about showcasing your acting skills; it's about narrating the untold stories, addressing the unspoken issues, and igniting conversations in the most impactful manner - through the collective art of street theater. Your mission is clear: capture the attention of the crowd, challenge preconceived notions, and inspire change through the power of your performance. This competition is not just about winning; it's about raising awareness, kindling hope, and creating impact.

1. A team of 6-10 participants should be there.
2. Theme will be already provided to you.
3. Themes:
1. Gender inequality or women empowerment.
2. Healthcare and sanitation issues.
3. Mental health awareness
4. Road safety and traffic awareness.
5. Addiction of mobile phones and gadgets.

Rangmanch will be held on 19th October, 2023.

1. Every team must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the team on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. Time limit for Rangmanch is 5-7 minutes.
4. There is no language barrier.
5. No vulgarity in should be there otherwise the teams will be disqualified.
6. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.

Kanika -
Navdeep -
WhatsApp Group



Reels Recursive
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

Reels Recursive" challenges you to break free from the conventional and explore the uncharted territory of creative video making. Your mission is to craft stories that captivate, entertain, or inspire within the constraints of short-form content. Whether it's a quirky skit, a breathtaking time-lapse, or a thought-provoking message, each reel is an opportunity to share your unique perspective.
"Reels Recursive" is more than a competition; it's a celebration of creativity, innovation, and the evolving art of storytelling in the digital age. As you watch the videos presented here, remember that each reel represents a moment, a message, and a piece of art waiting to be discovered.
So, prepare to dive into the realm of creative videos, to experience moments of humor, heart, and surprise. Your role is to be the audience, the curator, and the admirer of the artistic talent on display.

1. Participants have to register individually.
2. Themes for the competition will be given 20 minutes prior the competition.
3. 1 hour will be given to the participants for making the reel.

Reels recursive will be held on 20th October, 2023.

1. Every participant must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the participant on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. Time limit for Reels Recursive is 1 hour.
4. There is no language barrier.
5. No vulgarity in should be there otherwise the teams will be disqualified.
6. The reel should be of 30 seconds – 1 minute.
7. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.

Daman -

Photography
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

Photography is more than just taking pictures; it's about seizing a fraction of time, preserving a memory, and sharing your unique outlook on the world. "Captured Moments" is a testament to the stories that images can tell and the emotions they can evoke.
Whether you're a professional photographer, an amateur with a smartphone, or someone who's simply passionate about capturing the beauty of the world, "Captured Moments" invites you to share your visual stories with the world. So, ready your camera, adjust your perspective, and prepare to be mesmerized by the enchanting world of photography. Your role is to be the audience, the critic, and the admirer of the artistic talent on display.

1. PARTICIPANT HAS TO PARTICIPATE INDIVIDUALLY.
2. PARTICIPANT MUST BRING HIS/HER OWN CAMERA OR SMARTPHONE.
3. THEME AND LOCATION FOR THE PHOTOGRAPHY COMPETITION WILL BE PROVIDED 15 MINUTES BEFORE COMPETITION.

THIS EVENT WILL BE HELD ON 20TH OCTOBER, 2023.

1. Every participant must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the participant on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. Time limit for Photography Competition is 1 hour.
4. Editing is not allowed.
5. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.

ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

"Cinematic Visions" is more than just a competition; it's a celebration of creativity, innovation, and the evolving art of visual storytelling. As you watch the videos presented here, remember that each clip represents a vision, a moment, and a piece of art waiting to be discovered.
So, gear up your cameras, adjust your lenses, and prepare to be transported to a world of visual narratives. Your role is to be the audience, the critic, and the admirer of the cinematic talent on display.

1. PARTICIPANT HAS TO PARTICIPATE INDIVIDUALLY.
2. PARTICIPANT MUST BRING HIS/HER OWN CAMERA OR SMARTPHONE.

Fashionista
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

In a world where fashion is a reflection of our individuality and a canvas for our self-expression, "Fashionista" is your runway to flaunt your unique style and passion for all things fashion. Today, we come together to honor the trendsetters, the designers, and the models who have the power to influence and inspire. Fashion is more than just clothes; it's about expressing your personality, creating visual poetry, and pushing the boundaries of creativity. "Fashionista" is a testament to the transformative power of style and the beauty of using fashion as a form of artistic expression.

1. The participant must participate individually.
2. First 40 registrations will get opportunity to be a model of LAKME in the fashion show.
3. The theme for the Fashionista is Retro.
4. The Fashionista is of two rounds i.e. ROUND 1 – Ramp Walk and ROUND 2 – Questionnaire Round.

Fashionista will be held on 20th October, 2023.

1. Every participant must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the participant on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. Further details will be updated on the website, WhatsApp Groups and will also be communicated through email.
4. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.

Standup Comedy / Mimicry
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

In a world where laughter is the universal language that brings people together, "Comic Chronicles" is your ticket to a world of wit, satire, and uncanny impressions. Today, we've gathered to celebrate the laughter-makers, the humorists, and the impressionists who have the gift of turning everyday situations into side-splitting tales and making us roll with laughter.
"Comic Chronicles" is more than just a competition; it's a celebration of humor, satire, and the power of laughter to uplift spirits and bring people together. As you watch the performances, remember that each joke, each punchline, and each impression represent a moment of delight waiting to be experienced.

1. PARTICIPANT SHOULD REGISTER INDIVIDUALLY.
2. THE TIME LIMIT FOR BOTH STANDUP COMEDY AND MIMICRY COMPETITION IS 2-3 MINUTES.
3. FOR MIMICRY COMPETITION, PARTICIPANT CAN DRESS UP LIKE THE PERSON WHO HE/SHE IS MIMICKING.
4. THERE WILL BE 2 ROUNDS OF THIS COMPETITION.

THE ROUND 1 OF THIS COMPETITION WILL BE HELD ON 19TH OCTOBER, 2023.
THE ROUND 2 OF THIS COMPETITION WILL BE HELD ON 20TH OCTOBER, 2023.

1. Every participant must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the participant on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. There is no language barrier.
4. There should be no vulgarity, otherwise participant will be disqualified.
5. Further details will be updated on the website, WhatsApp Groups and will also be communicated through email.
6. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.
